text:
@PressSec @realDonaldTrump Chiiiile Please.

Other nations were able to test all their people.

The Trump Admin is concerned about one thing -- looking good -- but not actually being good.

He wanted the governors to hide their coronavirus death numbers, so it wouldn't look as bad.

This is Trump's Katrina https://t.co/Pii1Yih4BN
